/config.description: Choose a Share for Plex configuration. Eg: create a Share called plex-config for this purpose alone.
/config.label: Config Storage

/data.description: Choose a Share for Plex content(your media). Eg: create a Share called plex-data for this purpose alone. You can also assign other media Shares on the system after installation.
/data.label: Data Storage

/transcode.description: Choose a Share for Plex transcoding content. Eg: create a Share called transcode the faster the drive the better for this purpose.
/transcode.label: Transcoding Storage

VERSION.description: Choose version of plex. unless you know which version to try, just type latest
VERSION.label: VERSION

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run Plex with. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID

Plex.more_info:
Adding more media to Plex.

You can add more Shares(with media) to Plex from the settings wizard of this Rock-on. Then, from Plex WebUI, you can update and re-index your library.
